arts.ttl: Millenic Alli stunner fires Exeter to overdue victory at Burton
Exeter City needing a win to lift the gloom after recent results
arts.sum: Both Caldwell and captain Pierce Sweeney alluded to some pretty harsh things being said at half-time, by players and staff, which may have contributed to a poor second half in which the Tykes scored twice to win 2-1. “We had good honest conversations, players and staff, and got things together again, now we want to start winning games again and look forward to the New Year with real positivity.

arts.ttl: Exeter City seek quality over quantity in the January transfer window
arts.sum: GARY Caldwell will prioritise quality over quantity in the January transfer window as he seeks reinforcements to take Exeter City to the next level, writes Stuart James. This year, it will be quality,” Caldwell said.

arts.ttl: Pat Jones makes Exeter City return as Grecians fans get first glimpse
arts.sum: “We got in behind them quite a few times, but we started off well and we finished the game well as well. “It was good and we started really well,” Jones said.
